text: Polyana () is the name of several rural localities in Russia: *Polyana, Amur Oblast, a selo in Seryshevsky District, Amur Oblast *Polyana, Astrakhan Oblast, a village in Privolzhsky District, Astrakhan Oblast and in Ukraine: *Polyana, a village in Turyatka, Chernivtsi Oblast *Polyana, Khotyn Raion, Chernivtsi Oblast
title: Polyana
